PaladinMod:AngelForm.NAME: Angel Form
PaladinMod:AngelForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: I am already in Angel Form.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am already in Angel Form.

PaladinMod:AuraOfHate.NAME: Aura of Hate
PaladinMod:AuraOfHate.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if your Divinity is negative, gain !M! Strength.

PaladinMod:AuraOfPurity.NAME: Aura of Purity
PaladinMod:AuraOfPurity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status card, Exhaust it.
PaladinMod:AuraOfPurity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Whenever you draw a Status, Exhaust it.

PaladinMod:CleansingTouch.NAME: Cleansing Touch
PaladinMod:CleansingTouch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove a random debuff. Draw !CD! card. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:CrownOfMadness.NAME: Crown of Madness
PaladinMod:CrownOfMadness.DESCRIPTION: If your Divinity is negative, Stun ALL enemies. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:DestructiveWave.NAME: Destructive Wave
PaladinMod:DestructiveWave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

PaladinMod:DisarmingStrike.NAME: Disarming Strike
PaladinMod:DisarmingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If your Divinity is negative, enemy loses !M! Strength.

PaladinMod:DivineFavor.NAME: Divine Favor
PaladinMod:DivineFavor.DESCRIPTION: If your Divinity is positive, draw !CD! cards. Lose !DIV! Divinity.

PaladinMod:DivineJustice.NAME: Divine Justice
PaladinMod:DivineJustice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals !M! additional damage fo each Divinity you have. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:GuidedStrike.NAME: Guided Strike
PaladinMod:GuidedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Choose a card in your hand to place on top of your draw pile.

PaladinMod:GuidingHand.NAME: Guiding Hand
PaladinMod:GuidingHand.DESCRIPTION: Retain up to one card. It costs one less next turn.

PaladinMod:HammerToss.NAME: Hammer Toss
PaladinMod:HammerToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. You can't play Attacks next turn.

PaladinMod:HellishRebuke.NAME: Hellish Rebuke
PaladinMod:HellishRebuke.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your negative Divinity.

PaladinMod:HolyAvenger.NAME: Holy Avenger
PaladinMod:HolyAvenger.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Smite to your hand.

PaladinMod:HolyShield.NAME: Holy Shield
PaladinMod:HolyShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

PaladinMod:HolyWrath.NAME: Holy Wrath
PaladinMod:HolyWrath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Divinity you have. Lose all Divinity.

PaladinMod:InflictWounds.NAME: Inflict Wounds
PaladinMod:InflictWounds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals an additional !M! damage if your Divinity is negative.

PaladinMod:LayOnHands.NAME: Lay on Hands
PaladinMod:LayOnHands.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. Permanently reduce the HP healed by 1.

PaladinMod:Massacre.NAME: Massacre
PaladinMod:Massacre.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Lose !DIV! Divinity.

PaladinMod:Meditate.NAME: Meditate
PaladinMod:Meditate.DESCRIPTION: Draw !CD! cards. Lose !M! Strength until your next turn.

PaladinMod:NeowGuidance.NAME: Neow's Guidance
PaladinMod:NeowGuidance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !DIV! Divinity. Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! Intangible. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:NeowRage.NAME: Neow's Rage
PaladinMod:NeowRage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you dealt unblocked damage, Stun the enemy. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:PerfectedSmite.NAME: Perfected Smite
PaladinMod:PerfectedSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals an additional !M! damage for each Smite in your deck.

PaladinMod:Prayer.NAME: Prayer
PaladinMod:Prayer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Enemies lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:Purge.NAME: Purge
PaladinMod:Purge.DESCRIPTION: Move all Curse and Status cards from your draw pile to your discard pile. Exhaust.

PaladinMod:PurgingStrike.NAME: Purging Strike
PaladinMod:PurgingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Remove a random debuff.

PaladinMod:Redemption.NAME: Redemption
PaladinMod:Redemption.DESCRIPTION: Reset your Divinity to zero. Your Divinity can no longer go negative.

PaladinMod:SearingSmite.NAME: Searing Smite
PaladinMod:SearingSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal 5 damage for every !M! Divinity you have.

PaladinMod:SolemnVigil.NAME: Solemn Vigil
PaladinMod:SolemnVigil.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

PaladinMod:SwordAndShield.NAME: Sword & Shield
PaladinMod:SwordAndShield.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block X times.
PaladinMod:SwordAndShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block X+1 times.

PaladinMod:WayOfVengeance.NAME: Way of Vengeance
PaladinMod:WayOfVengeance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Divinity, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.
